Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see that it has now been located and is awaiting collection at Brisbane GPO.

Bring along some photo ID showing your name or the address matching the parcel, or find other ways to collect or to authorise someone else on your behalf.
